sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: loxP
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Cre-mediated recombination occurs in the 8-bp core sequence (GCATACAT).
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: loxP

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: lox2272
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: lox2272
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Cre-mediated recombination occurs in the 8-bp core sequence (GGATACTT). lox2272 sites are compatible with each other, but incompatible with loxP or loxN sites (Lee and Saito, 1988).

sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:description: Cation channelrhodopsin ChrimsonR fused to mRuby2 fluorophore and targeted to the neuronal soma and proximal dendrites in a viral vector.
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refBib: Three-dimensional scanless holographic optogenetics with temporal focusing (3D-SHOT). Pegard NC, Mardinly AR, Oldenburg IA, Sridharan S, Waller L, Adesnik H. Nat Commun. 2017 Oct 31;8(1):1228. doi: 10.1038/s41467-017-01031-3. 10.1038/s41467-017-01031-3 PubMed 29089483

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: EBV-rev
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: SV40 polyA terminator, reverse primer

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:growthInstructions: Use recombination deficient competent cells such as SURE2 to prevent pAAV recombination
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:pricing: $350 USD for preparation of 100 µL virus + $30 USD for plasmid.
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:tagsFusionProteins: mRuby2 soma targeting motif (C terminal on insert)
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:shipment: Viral particles are shipped frozen on dry ice. Plasmid DNA (≥ 200ng) will also be included in the shipment.

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Cre-mediated recombination occurs in the 8-bp core sequence (GGATACTT). lox2272 sites are compatible with each other, but incompatible with loxP or loxN sites (Lee and Saito, 1988).

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refMethod: pAAV-hSyn-DIO-ChrimsonR-mRuby2-ST was a gift from Hillel Adesnik (Addgene plasmid # 105448 ; http://n2t.net/addgene:105448 ; RRID:Addgene_105448) For viral preps, please replace (Addgene plasmid # 105448) in the above sentence with: (Addgene viral prep # 105448-AAV9)
